A wave of regret washed over Chris as he realized just how deep of a hole he had dug for himself. "Stop dilly dallying and get your ass over here!" Coach said from out on the wrestling mat.
As he was standing next to Coach Maslow Chris began to realize just how much trouble he was in. Coach's hulking 6'6" figure loomed over Chris' puny self. 154111111.content:
"Alrigthy, pipsqueak, let's see if you're any better at this than the bench press but, judging by the size of those twigs you call arms, probably not," said Mr. Smith as you reached the lifting area. "Here, I'll start you out with what I started with when I was your age," he says as he hands you a pair of 50lbs (22.7kg) weights. Naturally, they fall straight to the ground below as you're unable to hold them up. "Really, boy? You can't even hold up a 50lbs dumbbell?" questions your hulking math teacher, "I'm gonna give you until the count of ten to either answer ten math problems or to do one bicep curl with that weight."

You knew there was no chance in hell that your dumb ass was going to able to answer those problems, especially under the pressure of two beastly men staring you down, just waiting for you to fail. You struggled with all your might to lift the weights but they stubbornly refused to budge an inch. "*hrrnnnnn*, t-they're too heavyy~," you groan, acutely aware that you were running out of time.

"3...2...1, time's up, noodle arms," bluntly states your math teacher with a tinge of disappointment, "those math problems weren't even that difficult and that weight...that weight was what I started out with. You really are a runt, aren't you? Well, let's move onto a different method of education, squeezing the answer out of your head."

"Wait, what?" you panically questioned. Whatever he meant by, "Squeezing the answer out of your head," couldn't possibly result in anything good for you.

"ohoho, I'm gonna enjoy this," eagerly stated Coach Bruce.

"I bet you are, Brucie. Now, shit head, let me show you what a real man lifts," and with that the hulking educator grabbed a pair of 110lbs (50kg) dumbbells and proceeded to crank out reps with impressive speed. "Now that I'm warmed up, the fun can begin. Brucie, I think you know what to do."

"That I do, come 'ere, runt."

Before you could escape Coach Bruce had you in his grasp. Grasping your face with one hand as he forced it into the bend of Mr. Smith's elbow, sandwiching your face in between two mountains of muscle.
(Something like this: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CS8u_qsU8AAj... )

"Perfect. Now, pipsqueak, what I'm going to do is ask you a series of questions from your last test. Every time you get one wrong I'll do one rep, got it?"

"A-and i-if I get o-one right?"

"Nothing, I'm a strong proponent of negative reinforcement so I only punish," bluntly stated Mr. Smith in a very mater of fact tone.

"So, you're not gonna give me anything for right answers?"

"Well no shit, that's what's wrong with kids nowadays. You're always expecting some sort of reward for doing the most mundane of tasks correctly, pathetic. It's like you're all animals or something, even though animals would probably outrank your weak asses on the evolutionary scale. All of you need to learn the meaning of hard work, and I'm gonna teach it to you," roared Mr. Smith in an increasingly more enraged tone. Subsequently, tensing his muscles and crushing your poor face in the process, Luckily, he stopped before he managed to do any real damage, much to the dismay of Coach Bruce who had been watching with eager eyes, yearning to watch you be made an example of for the rest of your generation.

"Awww, why'd you stop. His eyes were about to pop out," whined Coach Bruce.

"Well I can't kill him," retorted Mr. Smith

"Why not? It's not like anybody's gonna miss him, he's a fucking runt for crying out load. Plus, you'd be doing the world a favor, one less waste of oxygen on the planet," argued Coach Bruce.

"Convincing but no dice, he lives," stated Mr. Smith

Hearing you life being talked about like it were nothing hurt. It hurt but not like any pain you had felt before, physical or emotional. You tried telling yourself that it wasn't true, that you did matter and weren't a waste of oxygen, but as hard as you tried you couldn't shake the feeling that is was true. Especially since the comment came from an adult, somebody that you're supposed to look up to for guidance, somebody who's full of wisdom and experience, somebody who's made it in life. For them to tell you that you're life didn't matter...well, it has to be true, doesn't it? No, no it can't be. But, this wasn't just any adult, it was two educators. Two people who are in charge of shaping future minds, who have seen groups of kids pass through their classes and onto the real world. Who have, undoubtedly, seen people succeed and fail. After so many years in the field they must be experts in spotting who will succeed and who will fail, shouldn't they be? So, for them to talk about you in such a manner would insinuate that...your life...your very existence...was....worthless?

As you pondered Mr. Smith quickly, and painfully, plunged you back to reality with a skull crushing bicep curl. "OOWW!!!!, WHY??!!" you angrily blurted, surprising even yourself with such and outburst.

"Ooh, boy's getting a bit feisty, ain't he?" commented Coach Bruce.

"I think you're right, Brucie. Well, at least we're building up his character a bit. As for your question, sweat rag, you failed to answer the question I asked you. Speaking of which, here's your second question *asks question*"

Unsurprisingly, you couldn't answer that one correctly...or any of them for that fact. And, as promised, your face was repeatedly compressed in between your math teacher's bulging arm muscles. Eventually, you got somewhat used to the pain (probably due to some sort of brain damaged repetitively crushing your head caused), which Mr. Smith took note of by the time you reached the final question.

"So, sweat rag, what's the answer?" he said whilst progressively tightening his grip as opposed to waiting for you to fail before he did his rep. To make thing worse, he had started to work up quite a sweat which his immense grip was forcing into your skin. This effectively marinated your face in his slimy, rank smelling sweat. You thought it would never end, the increasing pressure, the feeling of somebody else's sweat being forced into your pores, the pungent smell but, of course, they could. To everyone's surprise, Coach Bruce suddenly shoved his hairy, swampy armpit into your face.

"Come on, boy, tell us what's the answer," added Coach Bruce.

"Thanks for the help, Brucie, but I think it's about time I let him go. It's clear that whatever shit he got in his skull isn't gonna come up with an answer any time soon."

"Awww, but I was just getting started," whined Coach Bruce as he removed his toxic pit from your face.

You collapsed to the ground as soon as Mr. Smith released your from his iron-clad grip, gasping for air. Armpits naturally don't have a pleasant stench but Coach Bruce's, Coach Bruce's took the cake for the most foul by far. If Mr. Smith hadn't stopped him who knows if you would even had been able to survive. Maybe you would of if it was just them on their own but when coupled with Mr. Smith's ambient sweat and having your skull crush would certainly not be possible.

As you slowly stood up and futilely tried to wipe the sweat from your face (it stuck to you like glue) you were greeted with a smiling Mr. Smith.
154111111.title: It starts

1541111111.content:
"You ready for our next round, sweat rag?" said Mr. Smith in a chipper tone.

"Whatever it is I regrettably won't be joining you, gotta get my daily run in, you know?" commented Coach Bruce.

"Awww, that's to bad, Brucie. Well, it's been good catching up with you. We should have a chat soon," replied Mr. Smith.

"Yeah, let's."

And with that, Coach Bruce turned around to leave but not before blasting a quick, raunchy fart in your direction

"Haha, nice one," giggled Mr. Smith as he jokingly waved a hand in front of his nose.

"Thanks, you know I try"

You, however, did not jokingly pinch your nose in disgust as the rank stench singed your nose hairs.

"Haha, that's not gonna be much help to you soon, boy. Let's get moving to our next exercise: lying leg curls, I'm sure you'll find these to be enjoyable...to me at least. Come on, follow me"

You made sure to keep a respectable distance behind your towering math teacher, not wanting to accidentally walk into his rear end whilst he fires a blast from his ass-cannon again. Still, you felt like you should stick fairly close to him as you navigated through your unfamiliar and intimidating surroundings. Especially since it was filled with hulking men that could do whatever they wanted to you without their being anything you could do to stop them. Like it or not, Mr. Smith was your private escort keeping you safe through the dangerous lands you traveled. Before long you both arrived at the lying leg press machine.

"Alright, shit for brains, get on and show me what you got. This is your last shot so if you fail at this I'm afraid that there'll be extra severe consequences," said Mr. Smith in a surprisingly calm tone.

You hopped onto the machine without saying a word and prepared yourself to lift the lightest weight the machine had to offer. After all, it seemed to be a pretty straightforwards concept, just bend your legs while laying down. Then again, so was everything else you had done. If history had any say in it this wasn't about to end well for you. But, much to the surprise of Mr. Smith and even yourself, you managed to be able to do a couple of flimsy reps before you died out.

"I'm impressed. But you still need to answer some math problems whilst lifting," cruelly reminded Mr. Smith.

"God damn it," you frustratingly exclaim, having just thought you had gotten away without having to endure Mr. Smith's "negative reinforcements."

"ooh, so close but no cigar. Your dumb ass forgot the negative sign."

"Really?! It's wrong just because of a frickin negative sign?! Not even half points?!" you complain.

"Yup, no watch it with that tone. Not to say that a more assertive personality wouldn't serve you well but you still need to remember who's in charge here or did forget, pipsqueak," Mr. Smith said as he gradually got more in your face before finishing with a quick pec bounce to remind you of his absolute control over you, "as for partial credit, I don't believe in that crap. It's either right or wrong never in between. That's just how the real world works but your generation can't seem to understand that either, unbelievable. You're just a bunch of snow flakes and I think I've just got a way to melt 'em."

All of the sudden, Mr. Smith ripped you from the machine and grabbed a jump rope that had been lying nearby before proceeding to bind your to the part of the machine that one's legs moved in a way that caused your face to be rammed into his firm gluts with every rep. (https://photos.app.goo.gl/MoB3VurxAPk9Yg... )

"W-what are you doing?! Let me go!" you begged.

"I'm just making sure a very special snow flake can't escape what's coming to it," coolly said Mr. Smith and with a few final tugs of the rope to make sure that you couldn't move, Mr. Smith started his workout.

You were repeatedly and violently trusted forwards just to repeatedly crash land face first into Mt. Smith-ass. At least his cheeks cushioned you landing a bit since they were, after all, very solid and well toned. They probably cushioned your impact just enough to prevent you from getting a concussion but did nothing to prevent you from getting a good whiff every time your face was slammed down. It seemed that as the day progressed the smell of Mr. Smith's ass worsened...significantly. He seemed to know full well of this as he started to hold you pressed against his ass for longer and longer periods of time until... *Guuurrrgggleee*

"I think my snow flake melter is ready for fire, there's no escaping this one so prepare to melt," eagerly stated Mr. Smith before he let out a small grunt.

*Pppfffftttt* Mr. Smith forcefully blasted you with a gusty, acrid, and piping hot blast as he brought you down towards his ass, intensifying the blast in the process. There was no doubt about it, if you were a real snowflake, you would have certainly not only melted but evaporated into stream. You coughed and heaved from partially the stench but mostly due to the blast being like pepper spray to your eyes and mouth, it wasn't only hot temperature wise but also burned like a hot pepper. As for the force, it was so strong that it actually slowed your decent a bit.

"Ahhh~, that felt good. I've been holding my farts in for a while since it tends to make them more forceful and hotter, perfect for melting snow flakes, huh. You know what, ass face, I was probably gonna blast you even if you did get that answer right since there's only a limited time you can hold back protein-fueled farts and it would have been a waste to cut one lose and not force it up the nose of someone who hates it. I'm sure you understand *gurgle* oh, I think the snow flake melter's reloaded."

"What the heck, that's so unfair. You should keep your promises," you retort to Mr. Smith's previous comment .

"Huh, I guess. I promise you that you'll get another gale force blast at point blank range."

And, true to his word, Mr. Smith blasted you with another climate changing fart that singed off some of your nose hair and left your mouth feeling like you had just eaten a ghost pepper. Your face was smashed many more times into your math teacher's perfect gluts only to be blasted by a fart that was just as bad as the one before it. Sometimes he'd blast you on your way down so you'd have a gradual fade in to the smell, other times he'd try to see if his gas was capable of pushing you backwards, and others he'd just hold you firmly against his ass whilst cutting a deep growler. It was all like a game or demented science experiment to your bully of a math teacher. Eventually, it came to an end when Mr. Smith decided to...
1541111111.title: Next Workout

15411111111.content:
*Pfffftttttt* "ahh~ that was a man's fart!" exclaims Mr. Smith with a sigh, "Oh would you look at the clock; it looks like our time together is running short."

You, of course, couldn't see the clock due to your current position of being bound to a piece of sweaty gym equipment. Regardless, you couldn't help feel relief as your one on one time with Mr. Smith was coming to an end. You could almost laugh or cry from the waves of emotion that came crashing over you, inundating you in hysteric bliss. You'd almost thought that it would never come to an end; the scorching heat, the nauseating stench, the foul slimy sweat, the pain, physical and emotional. You'd finally be free again, no longer to be under the control of another being. No longer to be at the whim of someone's strength and/or power. No longer to be an instrument of sadistic pleasure. You couldn't believe it even if you had been just as free just hours before, it was like being reborn.

"Yup, just little over an hour before we've got to be at school. Shame, I was hoping to have enough time to see how'd you do as a mat for my feet as I do squats over you," said Mr. Smith in a slightly sadden tone.

"One...more...hour," you stagger, "One more hour. god..." you were taken aback from the new. You had been expecting to be released within the next few minutes not the next hour. It was almost to much to bare but you managed to trudge on. What was one more hour? He wouldn't do another workout with so little time left, would he?

"Whelp, time to hit the locker rooms, ass face," said Mr. Smith as he arose from the machine and begun to untie you, "follow me~"

You obediently followed Mr. Smith in somewhat of a daze, still not being able to comprehend the various emotions that coursed your body. After a short walk, you arrived at the imposing entrance to the men's locker room. Unlike the usual stick figure marking the entrance there was a massive silhouette of a man flexing. Bold large point lettering written in an imposing white lay below the silhouette, reading a simplistic yet clear message: MEN. The sign seemed to be geared towards you as if to say, "Men only, get lost shit bag unless you're naive enough to think that you can handle what lies within."

"What you standing around for, boy, we ain't got all day for you to be perplexed by a door," said Mr. Smith as he opened the door and gestured for you to enter. You reluctantly obliged.

Entering the locker room at the gym was like entering the Parthenon with the amount of Greek god-like men who resided within and in nothing more. You were taken aback, not expecting for so many buff men to all go to the same gym. Men with firm and bulging arm and leg muscles, with abs on abs covering the abdomens like impenetrable armor, with firm and wide pecs, and with firm and bouncy gluts. You trembled at the thought of what they could do to you. Mr Smith, of course, noticed this.

"What's wrong boy? Never been surrounded by so many real men before? I don't blame you, must be intimidating for a twig like you to be surrounded by men like us. Here's a bit of advise, get over it since you're never going to be even remotely close to the same level as us," said Mr. Smith s he grasped your shoulder and walked forwards towards a more secluded section of the locker room. All the while rows and rows of towering men taunted you as you walked past, throwing insults like, "Lad's so small he'll need a ladder just to reach manhood," and, "How much you wanna bet that I could snap him in half like a twig?" or, "How're the fumes at ass level, shrimp. Pretty damn toxic if I were to guess."

You were on the verge of tears by the time you reached Mr. Smith's locker but he took no notice as he swung it open.
"As you can imagine, I can't teach class like this," he says whilst gesturing to his sweat soaked body, "It'd be unprofessional of me, not to mention the complaints that would certainly arise. Bunch of bull shit if you ask me but thems the rules, true manliness is banned. Hopefully one day a man will be allowed to be his true self at work, to be able to carry the stench of a hard workout around him like a badge of honor, for people to feel blessed to have even a few droplets of a real man's sweat caste upon them." Mr. Smith was briefly lost in thought as he imagined his ideal future before continuing, "Anyways, I need to get cleaned which means," Mr. Smith suddenly strips down until he's left wearing only a jockstrap, "I won't be needing these. Now, time for you to get to work."

You were left so aghast by the sight before you that Mr. Smith's last comment didn't even register. Mr. Smith's muscles weren't just large, they were downright gargantuan. Even his normal attire of form fitting clothing didn't do them justice. He had a perfect set of washboard abs with a plump yet firm pair of pecs to top. Moving down, his quads were like the columns of ancient temples, leading up to his ass which, for the first time, you got a full view of. It was like two rock-hard mountain peaks with a deep, hairy canyon dividing them. No wonder it smelled so bad, the 'canyon' must act as a sort of sponge, soaking up a bit of the stench from every fart that blasted its way through. This was worsen by the fact that it also acted as a collecting basin for not only ass sweat but also for the sweat that ran down Mr. Smith's broad back, worsening its ambient smell along with, undoubtedly, adding a little extra pizzazz to every one of his toxic blasts. As for what the cup of the jockstrap contained, well, it would put you to shame ten times over.

"Didn't you hear me?" roared Mr. Smith, "I said, get to work."

"Doing what?" you timidly questioned, having a renewed fear for him now that you've seen his unconstrained muscles.

"Cleaning me, of course," blasted Mr. Smith as if it were the most natural response in the world.

"W-what? How? Why? You can't possibly be serious," you foolishly retorted.

"How? With your tongue. Why? I need to be cleaned for work. And I am most certainly serious," sternly answered Mr. Smith

"T-that's disgusting, why don't you just take a shower or something? You can't make me do this, what if I refuse?"

"Come on, boy, you and I both know there's no way in hell you're gonna get out of this. As for why I don't take a shower, there's no fun in that. Plus, have you forgotten that the whole reason you're here is to learn some math? If squeezing the answer out of you didn't work, and if punishments for wrong answers didn't work, then maybe plain humiliation might work. And, who knows, maybe you'll be able to absorb some knowledge from my sweat. Does that answer your questions?"

You couldn't accept it, it was simply too much. Even if it was futile you had to take a stand. "No."

"Excuse me," replied Mr. Smith in a somewhat astonished tone.

"I said no, I won't do it," you said with wavering confidence.

Before you knew what was happening Mr. Smith had forcefully slammed you against the locker, bringing up his shorts which had a sweat stain going down the middle of the back, an outline of the canyon.

"Listen up, Bitch, I don't know who you think you're talking to but I'm your superior," Mr. Smith boomed whilst holding up his shorts to your nose, forcing you to breath in the foul stench. "I'm about to teach your whole useless generation a lesson on following orders, bitch. NOW CLEAN!"

Your heart beat faster then it had before, your flight or fight response in full blast, but you couldn't fight nor run. All you could do at that moment to get away with your life was obey. "Y-y-yes, s-sir," you said in a pathetic voice.

"That's what I like to hear, maggot."
15411111111.title: Head to the locker room

154111111111.content:
Mr. Smith released you from his iron grip, letting you to fall like a rag doll onto the cold concrete ground. You began to slowly stagger to your feet when you were suddenly and forcefully propelled downwards by an immense force on your back, slamming you back into the ground.

"Don't think you'll be starting from anywhere but the very bottom, maggot. That's a very important life lesson that you and your whole entitled-ass generation needs to learn. Now roll over so you can get started, floor mat," firmly commanded your domineering educator as he lifted a mighty foot off of your back, leaving you free to obey his commands.

You rolled over and slowly guided your eyes upwards, scanning every inch of muscle they passed until they reached his range-filled face. You were trapped in his stone cold gaze. Those frigid blue eyes of his swallowing you up how the ocean would swallow a boat, inundating you with his disdain for you and all like you. It was clear that at that moment he thought nothing more of you than a floor mat, a floor mat which he intended to use.

"Open your mouth and stick out your tongue."

You did as you were told, almost instantly regretting it as you had the sole of Mr. Smith's sweaty right foot slowly dragged along your face. It would be bad enough to just have to deal with the feeling of slimy foot sweat against your face but you weren't about to get away that easy. The smell of Mr. Smith's feet was something fierce, not to mention the taste that was now coating your tongue in a slime so thick you couldn't swallow it away.

"That's right, get that tongue of yours working you human floor mat. Let's see if you can rid me of that lingering stench that doesn't seem to go away no matter what I do. Naturally, I wouldn't be bothered by it since it's part of a real man's natural aroma but since it tends to cling to anything my feet touch, well, it becomes somewhat of an inconvenience to have to buy every pair of shoes you try on since the the shoe store insists they become, 'unsalable,' once my feet have been in them. I don't understand why they don't just spray the inside of the shoe with the stuff they use at bowling alleys."

Something told you that no cleaning spray could possibly destroy the mighty stench of Mr. Smith's putrid feet. You, after all, had just become somewhat of an expert on them now that both of them have been thoroughly, and vigorously, rubbed across your face and tongue. 'At least it's over now,' you thought.

"Alright, foot scrubber, it's time for you to clean out in between my toes. Gotta clear out all of that built up toe jam and sweat before it causes athlete's foot," said Mr. Smith as he shoved your nose between his big and second toes, allowing your tongue to have easy access to the space in between the two digits whilst simultaneously forcing you to breath in the cheesy stench. To make things worse, Mr. Smith suddenly placed his other foot on your abdomen, knocking the wind out of you as his full weight was suddenly on your puny body. "huh, you do make quite a comfortable floor mat, floor mat. I'll remember that."

You proceeded to clean in between all of Mr. Smith's toes with him never letting his full weight off of you, crushing your insides under the massive weight of his muscles, forcing his stench to penetrate deep into your skin that lay under his toxic feet. As bad as that was you found having to consume the gunk that had been trapped in between his toes. You tried your hardest not to vomit as every glob of gunk tasted like is was straight from a hazardise waste dump (it honestly should have ended up in one). He only stepped off once he deemed it was time for you to be promoted to cleaning the top of his feet, but not before he rubbed his feet on your body the same way someone would rub them against a door mat.

The top of his feet were much improved in terms of flavor but about the same or worse overall due to once critical factor: hair. Hair trapped in some of the sweat, causing the stench and taste to worsen, along with getting stuck to your tongue which caused you to gag in response. Nonetheless, you fought through it and finished Mr. Smith's rank feet like a champ.

"I'm almost impressed, foot face. Almost. Anyways, it's time for you to climb the corporate ladder and move onto my legs. Don't you dare think about moving on beyond them until I give you your next promotion, tryin' to educate you about the real world after all. Now start, sweat rag."

Cleaning Mr. Smith's legs was naturally a lot easier than his feet and he knew that. He, of course, couldn't allow that so he started flexing his powerful get muscles as you ran your tongue over them which caused his short, prickly leg hair to jut out like a porcupine's.

"Ow! What was that for?" you questioned as you recoiled in pain.

"What was what for bitch?" retorted Mr. Smith, seemingly unaware of the pain he had just caused you, "Did I say you could stop, bitch? No, I didn't. Now, get back to work before I'm forced to issue disciplinary action," boomed Mr. Smith as he forced your head back to his legs.

You continued to move up and down both of his legs below the knee, wincing in pain the whole time as Mr. Smith's flexed calves made it feel like your tongue was scraping against sandpaper. After a few more minutes you decided it was time to move onto Mr. Smith's tree truck-sized quads. You timidly, began to lick them, feeling their deep contours against your tongue, feeling them flex against you tongue, you were filled with much more than just physical pain. Simply knowing that you were so close to something that could end your existence in an instance was enough to cause some psychological damage. Feeling something that could end your existence in an instance harden under you, as if to prepare for the job, was more than enough to traumatize you.

The closer you got to the torso the worse the smell and taste got. It was no surprise considering the proximity to his ass and his crotch, sealed behind a stained jockstrap that did little to contain the smell. You were about to finish with the legs, all that was left to lean was a hard to reach spot in between the legs. As you stuck your head in between them disaster struck as Mr. Smith clamped down on your poor skull like a bear trap. You tried you best to free your head all to no avail until you were reduced to slapping Mr. Smith's legs.

"Looks like you're incapable of following simple instructions, shit for brains. Time for your disciplinary action," Announced Mr. Smith before suddenly tightening his grip on you skull as his whole body tensed for a brief moment before a rank, bassy blast escaped his fart-canon.

"Dammnn, who was that?" you heard someone say as you were released. "It stinks like a god's, I can only hope to someday reach that level of manliness."

"Hear that, pipsqueak? A real man welcomes the stench of another mans farts because a real man knows that farting is one of the purist forms of masculinity. Anyways, despite your previous blunder you'll be receiving another promotion. You can now clean me from waist to neck, begin."

Like the legs, cleaning the torso was relatively easy at first with you being able to wiz through Mr. Smith's back in no time. As for the front, you had no problems licking his washboard abs clean, even making sure to clean the valleys between them. It was only when you reached Mr. Smith's humongous pecs did problems begin to arise.
154111111111.title: You start

1541111111111.content:
You found yourself standing fully upright as you finished up licking Mr. Smith's top abs clean, placing you right at eye level with his sculpted pecs. When the time came to start cleaning them, for whatever reason, you hesitated. You weren't sure why but as you stared at the firm, muscular slabs that adorned his chest, you couldn't help but feel fear.

"What's wrong, sweat rag? These bad boys too much for ya?" he taunted whilst bouncing his pecs, filling you with even more fear. "I assure you that there's nothing to fear. Go on, clean 'em," he said in an untrustworthy tone. At this point you didn't have much of a point, you obliged.

Mr. Smith continued to flex his pecs as you ran your tongue over them, forcing you to taste his strength instead of only feeling it. You tried your best to finish up his plump yet firm chest as quickly as possible despite his flexing. This, however, proved to be difficult as you began to reach your vertical limits, forcing you onto your toes in order to reach the top of Mr. Smith's bouncing pecs. To make things worse, every bounce of his pecs was like a sucker punch to the face. His powerful pecs treated your poor face like a punching bag as you hurriedly tried to clean them, alternating their assault so that you didn't have a moment to recover. Somehow, you pushed through it and finished Mr. Smith's pecs off with one final triumphant lick.

"*Whistle* Looks like my boys did quite a number on your face, pipsqueak. That shiner ain't leaving you for a while," commented Mr. Smith.

You reached up to touch your eye in response to his last comment only to wince in pain as you felt it was swollen. You didn't even know when it happened, you must have been too distracted by the sour taste of Mr. Smith's sweat.

"But y'ain't finished yet, runt, there's one important spot that your dumb ass missed."

You hadn't the slightest idea of where you could have missed since you had made sure to be very thorough in order to avoid any further disciplinary action. Mr. Smith, seeing your perplexed face, let out a deep sigh before saying, "In between my pecs dumb ass."

"W-wait w-what? You can't be serious," you blurted out, seemingly not learning to what happens when you question your superiors.

"Oh I am, now get to work!" yelled Mr. Smith as he grabbed the back of your head and forced your face deep into the cleavage between his two firm pecs. "Make sure to get deep in there, sweat tends to get trapped there."

You began to struggle as your felt a crushing force from either side of your head. "Not so fast, pipsqueak," taunts Mr. Smith as he flexes his powerful pecs, firmly trapping your head. (Visual example of what's going on: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrfrRcBVsAAL... all rights go to author of respective work)

You felt like your skull was gonna crush at any second as the pressure was so great that t actually forced your tongue out of your mouth, somewhat convenient for the task at hand. You struggled to lick the area clean as the force on your skull caused you intense pain with each minute flick of your tongue or tilt of your head. Moreover, Mr. Smith wasn't lying about sweat collecting there as the smell was absolutely horrendous. It was almost as bad as his feet! There was one clear advantage over his feet though, you only had to clean up gallons of sweat instead of toe jam as well. Regardless, it was still horrible to have to choke down liter after liter of vial stagnate sweat, especially when your entire skull is being crushed, making swallowing especially painful.

After a few endless minutes, Mr. Smith ripped you back out with a wet plop, leaving you gasping for air as you held your head. "Not bad, runt. In fact, you did good enough to earn yourself your final promotion," spurted Mr. Smith as he towered over your hunched over self. You wondered what else there was to clean as you slowly looked up. Mr. Smith answered your question by lifting up both his arms, relieving his heavily forested pits, whilst flashing a cocky smile. "Fuck..." you mumbled.

Before you could so much as protest, as if anticipating a struggle, Mr. Smith forced your head into one of his hairy pits before sealing you in by lowering his arm. If Mr. Smith wore any deodorant it certainly wasn't making a difference in the smell as you were now trapped with what was, undoubtedly, the worst stench you had experienced thus far from cleaning his ripped body. The hair acted like a sponge, trapping in all of his sweat whilst also baking it in its intense heat, thus resulting in a truly nauseating stench. As you felt thick globes of stinking sweat rub all over your face you new it was inevitable, you stuck your tongue out and made contact with the pit hair jungle.

"That's right, sweat wipe, get in there good. I need all of that funk out of there, just one missed drop stinks enough for others to notice," said Mr. Smith as he lifted his other arm and took a whiff, "Ahh~ that's the smell of manhood right there. You know, some would consider such potent sweat to be a curse, can you believe that? I consider it to be a blessing, a sign of my innate superiority over others, an evolutionary signal developed to discourage weaklings like you from even consider messing with someone like me. That's why I don't abide by the modern sensibility of wearing deodorant, why would anyone ever want to cover up such an awesome stench? But, alas, I have to stoop down to the level of cleaning them, destroying a day's hard work for what? So that your sensitive-ass generation can be happy? Pathetic, it's like none of you know what it means to be a man. In fact, it's like your trying to neater the idea of manliness in general, uugghhhh it makes me so mad to even think about!" You had finished cleaning Mr. Smith's first pit during his rant but were unable to move on to the next one as he had tighten his grip on you as he became more enraged.

After a while, it seemed like Mr. Smith had noticed you had stopped cleaning as his rant about how terrible your generation was began to die down. He suddenly flung his arm upwards and transferred you to his other pit in one swift motion. "Get in there, snowflake, let's see if my steamy pit if hot enough to melt you!" he shouted in an enraged tone.

Your time in his second pit was no different than your time in his first. It was just as terrible in every way with the only difference being that Mr. Smith had finished his long winded rant about how your generation is going to be the downfall of humanity do to your "oversensitiveness" and "lack of manliness" so you were forced to listen to the deafening silence of his silent fuming. After what felt like an eternity, you were let out of your smelly prison.

"Alright, sweat wipe, it looks like you managed to clean my body from foot to neck like I instructed with only managing to fuck up a couple of times. I was planing on letting you go now that you've finished but I've just changed my mind." Your heart sank as those words came out of Mr. Smith's mouth, you wondered what else the brute could possibly have left for you to do. "You see, that speech I gave about your shitty-ass special snowflake generation filled me with rage and when that happens I tend to produce loads of gas. This on its own wouldn't be a problem but when coupled with a couple of protein shakes, well, let's just say that it would be better for me to get rid of them before class." Your eyes widened with realization as you realized what Mr. Smith was planning. "So I'm gonna be using you for the only thing I know you're good for, being a a sponge or the smell," Mr. Smith coolly said with a sly smile.

"Oh God, please no," you pleaded as Mr. Smith turned around. "NOOOOOOmmmm" your scream was cut short as Mr. Smith shoved his ass in your face, pinning you against the lockers with a bang.

Before letting any farts rip, Mr. Smith moved his ass slightly off your face in order to insure you could hear what he had to say. "Prepare yourself, snowflake. This one's not just gonna melt you but also make it impossible for you or any other snowflakes to ever form again!" with that said Mr. Smith shunted his firm booty back into your face and cut lose an imminence torrent of gas that shock all the lockers as violently as an earthquake would. It was as if somebody had left the gas on, leading to the entire locker room being coated in a thick layer of ass-stench. Undoubtedly, raising the temperature by a few degrees due to its intense heat. "Damn, that one was hot enough to make that 'climate change' nonsense your generation insists is real a reality," said Mr Smith, using air quotes as he said "climate change" in a mocking tone.

"W-what?!" you state in a shock tone, still recovering from the blast, "Climate change is proven to be real, just look at the signs!"

"Yeah, sure it is," mockingly states Mr. Smith

"It is! Even my science teacher says so! You're a teacher to, surely you must believe in science," you retort.

"Your science teacher is nothing but an nonathletic twig of a man, what does he know about anything? As for your precious science, I don't care for it. In my opinion all you need to thrive in life is mathematics and athletics, everything else can suck it. *guuurrrrgggllleee* Look's like I'm about to warm the planet even more, snowflake, and there's nothing you can do to stop me."

With that final retort you received another gaseous blast to the face, stinking up the entire room beyond belief. It seems like his rage-protein-fueled farts were too powerful for you to block. "Tell me, snowflake, what's causing climate change?"

"G-greenhouse *gag* g-gases," you managed to stumble out.

"So like the methane in my farts, yes? Well, let me ask you this: why would nature make something as natural as a fart so harmful to itself? Hmm?" Mr. Smith questioned whilst peppering your face with many more blasts

"I-it's not the f-farts. It-it's the emissions from f-factories a-and c-cars."
1541111111111.title: Continue

15411111111111.content:
(Ran out of space, whoops. BTW, I'm not trying to change anybody's stance on climate change [it's real tho] it's just part of the story to add to Mr. Smith's character. Anyways, enjoy!)

"Still, think about all of the men on this planet, about all the men who are just like the men at this gym. All of them ripping hundreds of methane-filled farts a day, just like me. Now, tell me what's the solution to climate change?"

"I-it's *gag* I-it's to reduce g-green *gag* house gas e-emissions," you somehow managed to blurt out despite the numerous blasts you had to endure.

"To reduce greenhouse gas emissions, you say? Does that mean reducing the number of farts a man can let rip? Tell me, how the hell would you limit the amount of farts a man cuts lose!? And what about animals, hmmm? I've heard your generation talk about banning cows because they fart too much. Is that what you plan to do to men, hmm? Or do you plan to just limit our protein intake? Well whatever it is I got new for you, snowflake, we real men and our methane-filled protein-fueled ass blasts aren't going anywhere. We're still going to eat our manly protein rich foods and drink our manly protein shakes in order to further build our muscles to the point where nothing can stand in our way. All the while, blasting trumpeting protein-powered farts over those who oppose us, defeating them with the potency of the smell alone. Yes! and there's absolutely nothing you or your entire environmentally conscious sorry excuse for a generation can do about it. And those are the cold hard facts, pipsqueak."

Suddenly, a torrent of gas escaped Mr. Smith's ass, Which lasted for so long that you couldn't disprove any of the points he had just made. This was, in no doubt, done on purpose so that he could appear to have won the argument. If anything, the prolonged blast made good punctuation to his final points, that real men and their farts were going nowhere and that their was nothing you could do to stop it. In fact, the bast didn't end until almost one minute later when is came to a sudden squelch, browning your nose a bit. The blast had been so powerful that it actually loosened some trapped ass-sweat droplets and launched them straight into your eyes, causing them to turn red with stinging rain. It was also strong enough to singe off your nose hairs and part of your eyebrows, leaving you looking comical. Those were only some of the things that Mr. Smith's bare ass was capable of doing.

"Ahh~, sorry I had to hurry that along, we're a bit crunched for time so I had to let out all of my remaining gas in one go. I would tell you to now lick my ass clean but it's the only part of my body besides my crotch that I can actually keep in its natural state. Their smell also comes in hand in the classroom since I can just walk over to a misbehaving student's desk and look down at them whilst my crotch is mere inches from their face. Or, when I student asks for help so I bend over their desk, shoving my ass right next to whomever's sitting across from the person I'm helping. The later's less for discipline and more for my own amusement but who cares? The real beauty of it is A.) there're easy explanations for my actions like, 'I was just standing nearby to make sure that they were doing their work, that's why my crotch was so close to them,' or, 'I was just helping them with a problem, my ass just happened to stick into somebody else's face." And B.) Even is someone does complain there's no way to prove that the smell came from me. Nobody's gonna ask to take a whiff of my crotch or my ass since that would be sexual harassment. What else are they gonna do beyond that, sniff my chair? Yeah, right. I'm literally unstoppable."

With that, Mr. Smith leaned off the lockers, allowing you to finally go free. You stood in a daze for a moment, wondering if you were actually going to go free now. Just then, what felt like a wet towel was thrown onto your head with great force, knocking you straight out of your daze. You quickly removed the object from your head only to come to the horrifying realizations that what had been thrown wasn't a towel but a pair of sweat soaked shorts that smelled like they had been sprayed by a skunk.

"Whhaaahh!" you exclaim as you toss the tainted shorts aside.

"haha, boy, the fuck was that reaction?" you heard a familiar voice say. You turned to see that it was none other than Coach Bruce himself. Not only that, but he was completely naked!

"Hey, Brucie, going commando as always I see. How was your run?"

"It was great, I managed to get an entire marathon in. Been rippin some ass blasts I smell," replied Coach Bruce as he sniffed the air, "Damn, you must have been angry or something to get them smellin like this, everything alright?"

You were simultaneously amazed and frightened at the fact that he was able to tell someone's mood by the stench of their farts.

"You know me well, Brucie. Yeah, this sweat rag here was cleaning me up when I remembered that it was because of his retarded-ass generation that I have to make him clean me up in the first place. I envy you, Brucie, being able to wear your natural musk to work."

"I see, I suppose I am luckier than most. Did you at least get back at the little runt?"

"Of course! I farted on him like there was no tomorrow whilst dispelling his climate change nonsense, seemed to really strike a nerve too."

"Hah, that's great. I guess he's a tree huger like all the other snowflakes his age, fucking disgusting. Mother nature was made so us real men can do whatever we want with it, that's why we're the strongest beings on the fuckin planet, boy," stated Coach Bruce whilst staring straight at you.

"T-that's not true..." you stuttered.

"Bitch, shut the fuck up and get the hell out of here. You're one on one study session is over, now scram before Iet the other guys have their way with you," yelled Mr. Smith.

"C-can I get cleaned up first?" you meekly questioned.

"Of course not! These facilities are for MEN ONLY and I think both of us have proven that you don't meet those qualifications," shouted Mr. Smith.

You turned to leave when all of the sudden, "Hey, runt, I got a parting gift for you," slyly said Coach Bruce as he pointed his ass at you and basted a nauseating fart right at you. You tried to pay no mind to his laughs or the smell and focused on making your way out of this hell on Earth.

After a couple of wrong turns you made it outdoors without further harm. You started you walk home, thinking about how many baths you'd have to take to get even an atom of stench off of you. There was also no chance in hell that your clothes were remotely salvageable. As you approached your home you heard honking from behind you, you turned only to see that it was none other than Coach Bruce and Mr. Smith riding in a lifted diesel pickup truck.

"Hey, snowflake, how'd you like some more of those greenhouse gas emissions you seem to like so much?" Questioned Coach Bruce. "Oh wait, that's right you don't like them. Oh well, I don't like you so you're getting them anyways. Hope you don't melt!," tauntingly added Mr. Smith. Coach Bruce proceeded to gun it, causing a plume of dark exhaust smoke to coat you and your surrounding in a thick layer of soot, leaving you wheezing and coughing as the duo drove off laughing.
15411111111111.title: next

154111111111112.content:
You somberly continued your walk home, your soot-covered body being quite the spectacle for any passersby. However, anytime someone tried to get a closer look they were instantly repelled by the unholy combinations of smells you'd acquired during your time at the gym with your brawny math teacher. As it turns out, not many people appreciate what he'd call, "A real man's scent." In fact, it seemed that not just people disapproved of the scent as all animals, wild and domestic, ran off with their tails between their legs when they got one whiff of you. Even plants seemed to be repulsed by the smell as the flowers you passed wilted and the trees you passed lost their leaves in a comical fashion. The only creatures that didn't seem to mind the smell were insects as they're naturally attracted to such repulsive stenches. Their innate attraction to the smell, however, turned out to be the worst mistake that they'd make in their short lives. They'd behave normal at first, happily buzzing away as they enjoyed the stink, before something strange began to happen. First, they'd begin to fly cricked, like moths, before suddenly worsening and crashing towards the ground, dead. As it turned out, all of Mr. Smith's malodorous emissions, his gas and sweat, proved fatal to any living being in high enough concentrations. Mr. Smith would undoubtedly see this as an, "evolutionary advantage." As something only the best of the best could possess, the manliest of the manliest; the innate ability to extinguish another life with only one's natural body functions.

You looked at the time as you arrived home, 8:00 AM, school had already started and both you parents had left for work. You decided that the day would be better spent trying to rid yourself of Mr. Smith's scent markings. You began by stripping off all of your clothes and tossing them in the washing machine with extra detergent, hoping that that would be enough. As your washing machine gallantly fought on the front lines, you stepped into the shower and began to wash yourself.

About thirty minutes later with half a bar of soap and half a bottle of shampoo gone, you were dismayed to discover that you'd successfully managed to remove approximately 1% of the stench. "This...this can't be possible," you wondered aloud, "It must be my imagination. Yeah, that's it. Plus, he practically forced the smell up my nose so it'd be natural that some of the stench would linger up there, right?"

Just to be safe, you showered until you ran out of soap and shampoo, furiously scrubbing away with a loofah until your skin turned a shade of bright red. That wasn't enough for you though so you remained in the shower, simply letting the water fall over you whilst entranced in deep thought, until the water ran cold. It was only then when you decided that it was time to leave the shower and inspect the remaining damage. You took a deep breath in only to discover that only about half of the original stench remained.

"You can't be serious," you slowly uttered, "You can't be fucking serious! I scrubbed until I was red all over, with soap! and I still stink like I was sprayed by a radioactive skunk! That's it!" In your rage you made a fatal mistake, you reached for a can of axe and began to spray yourself with it until it ran dry. Once you were done you took a deep breath and learned a lesson that most learn in middle school, axe+bad smell=worse smell. You had learn this lesson before yourself but stubbornly refused to learn from experience, resulting with you with your head in the toilet as soon as you took that whiff.

Luckily, the axe seemed to have weaken the smell and after another hour long bath, using every cleansing substance at your disposal, you managed to reduce the stench to only a few areas on your body; your face and where Mr. Smith had placed his other foot when he used you as a door mat.

By the time you finished bathing your washing machine, may God rest its soul, had finished. "Oh my how?!" you exclaimed as you received a sucker punch to the face as you opened the machine. You ruined clothes had somehow transferred their foul scent to the washing machine without losing their own stink in the slightest, such was the potency of Mr. Smith's odors. Nothing you did helped, both your clothes and washing machine were beyond salvation, not even the power of OxiClean was enough. You decided the best course of action to take was to simply burn the clothes, so you did.

You tossed the ruined clothes into your house's outdoor fire pit, still dripping wet from the wash, and held a lighter to them. To your surprise, the clothes ignited almost immediately and began to quickly burn. "Must be from all the methane in his farts. Must've somehow soaked into the fabric, weird," you speculated as you watched the pile burn.

It was then that you noticed just how bad your mouth tasted. You must've been so distracted by everything else that you'd somehow had forgotten all of the disgusting things your tongue had been forced to lick up. Eminently, you throwing up had probably helped with the taste. You immediately made your way back to the bathroom and grabbed your toothbrush and a tube of toothpaste, it was time to get to work.

You brushed until your gums bled and your arm was sore, using up the entire tube of toothpaste in the process. Despite this, you could still faintly taste the sourness of Mr. Smith's sweat, it would most likely stay with you for days to come. You made sure to throw away your toothbrush as you made your way to your bedroom, knowing that it was ruined. Despite it still being relatively early, you were extremely exhausted. At that moment you didn't care how'd you'd explain the broken washing machine, used up shampoo bottle and toothpaste tube, the lingering smell on your person, or the fact that you'd hadn't eaten (probably still full from Mr. Smith's toe jam and sweat). All that you cared about was getting some rest and putting an end to this horrible day. Hopefully tomorrow'll be better.
154111111111112.title: At home

1541111111111121.content:
Tomorrow was better, in a way, at least you didn't have to get up excruciatingly early or be forced to endure an intense workout. Other than that...well it wasn't as good as you'd hoped it would be.

You woke up in a cold sweat to the blare of your droning alarm clock, having just been jerked out of an all too real dream of Mr. Smith having his way with you. As you fought to regain your breath, you senses were suddenly overcome by the residual taste of Mr. Smith's foul sweat in your mouth along with the faint smell of his feet and rancid gas, the smells that hours of furious scrubbing were not able to eliminate from your tainted body. Out of shock, you quickly arose and sprinted to the bathroom and vomited. Such was the violent reaction your body had from experiencing such foul things first thing in the morning.

Your morning was fairly normal after that except for your parents trying to figure out why the washing machine was making clothes smell worse. You left before they came to a conclusion.

As you approached school an increasing sense of dread crept over you, overcoming your senses as you approached the door to Mr. Smith's classroom. You always dreaded going to math class because of your disenchantment and growing disdain for the subject, but now. Now your dread was out of fear. Fear from the knowledge of what your hulking math teacher was capable of. "He can't do anything while we're in class," you whispered to yourself in a reassuring manner as you felt the cold, metallic touch of the classroom's doorknob. The door opened with a creak.

You were right for the most part, Mr. Smith showed no malicious intent towards you, largely ignoring your existence. Still, you made sure to pay extra attention during class, not wanting to give the brute any reason to single you out. The extra attention you were paying did help you spot something you didn't notice before about class, Mr. Smith discreetly using his musk on students just how he said he did. You watched in disbelief as you watched a talking kid get a face full of crotch as Mr. Smith glared disapprovingly from above until the kid stopped talking and did his work. You saw another student get a face full of ass as Mr. Smith bent over to help another student with a problem. You couldn't believe it, he actually used his rank musk to torment his students in class! Nowhere was safe!

The rest of the school year went by without any serious incident save you getting the occasional ass or crotch to the face, always followed by a discreet wink from Mr. Smith. You noticed some other students got winks as well. You wondered what that could be about. I didn't matter for much longer, however, as your last day in Mr. Smith's hell hole of a class finally arrived. 'Finally,' you thought as you walked into the room, 'it's finally the last day! Just two more hours and I'll be done for good! Yes!'
1541111111111121.title: At School

15411111111111211.content:
You already new that your last day in Mr. Smith's class was going to be a rather boring and straightforward day as only a handful of students were present. Unlike most other classes on their last day, who'd be busy taking their final exams, you'd be doing nothing as you had your final last week as most of your class was comprised of seniors who were excused from classes during the last week of school. So there you sat, eagerly watching the minutes tick by to the extended two hour period, intended to give students enough time to take their final exams but only served to cruelly extend the amount of time you had to spend with Mr. Smith.

About a quarter of the way through the period your monotonous social media scrolling, meant to stave off boredom, was interrupted by a letter being delivered to your desk. Before you could open the letter Mr. Smith appeared at your desk, peering down at you with his rank crotch dangerously close to your face. "Whatcha got there?" he eagerly questioned as you opened the letter and read its contents.

"It's," you said as you read the letter, "a summer assignment, fun..."

"Ooh, for what class?" questioned Mr. Smith, his excitement somewhat concerning you.

'He must just be trying to keep up an act for the class, probably best for me just to play along,' you thought. "Looks like it's for...AP Environmental Science. That's the science class that I'm taking next year."

"Very interesting, I don't believe that I've had any of my students take that course before. Do tell, what's the class about? Are you interested in the subject?" asked Mr. Smith with a seemingly genuine curiosity, you kept your guard up. You knew he was planning something no doubt.

"I guess I'm fairly interested," you stumbled as you tried to make a conversation with your tormentor appear as normal as possible to the public eye, "I mean...I've been wanting to take the class since my freshman year but haven't had room in my schedule until now."

"It's good that you were able to fit it in before you graduate, would've been such a shame of you didn't manage to fit it in. Still, tell me, what's the course about?"

You wanted nothing more in that moment than for the conversation to end but it appeared as if Mr. Smith wasn't going to allow that to happen with his incisive questions. "Ummm...it covers the concepts of energy transfer, interactions between earth systems, interactions between different species and the environment, and sustainability," you said practically directly quoting the course outline.

"Sustainability, you say, very interesting," inquired Mr. Smith

'Ah shit,' you thought, mentally bracing yourself for another one of Mr. Smith's rants.

"Tell me more, what exactly does sustainability entail?"

'Goddamn it, why'd I even have to give such an in depth answer? ughh, there's no way around it, here we go.'
"I believe it entails learning about how to responsibly use resources in order to limit our environmental impact and pollution," you honestly answered, hoping that Mr. Smith wouldn't continue the conversation much further than acknowledging your response.

"I see, pretty useless stuff to learn if you ask me," responded Mr. Smith, clearly wanting you to refute his statement. You would do no such thing.

Right as you thought you were in the clear, you heard a voice speak up from across the room. "Why do you say that?"

"God-fuck..." you exhaled under your breath.

"I'm glad you asked. The way I see it, there's no point in practicing this 'sustainability' nonsense since the natural resources of this planet are meant to be exploited. That's their whole point for existing after all!" firmly stated Mr. Smith.

"I understand where you're coming from but it's still important to understand that is resources are too rapidly exploited then there won't be anymore to go around in the long run. Not to mention the consequences that would arise such as increased pollution, loss of diversity, and climate change," rebutted your classmate in a parliamentary manner.

'These fuckin' MUN kids I swear...' you angrily thought, knowing full well what your unknowing classmate had just done.

"I beg to differ, you see, the natural resources of the world are meant to be exploited by real men at any rate he sees fit. I do concede that your point about there not being enough resources in the long run is correct but on nothing more," said Mr. Smith with a glint in his eyes, preparing for an epic debate.

"I don't believe I fully understand. Could you please clarify what you meant by, 'real men,'" returned your classmate in a textbook manner.

"You're telling me you don't know what a real man is? Even when you have a perfect example of a real man right in front of you," exclaimed Mr. Smith as he did a series of bodybuilder poses, "A real man is man who's miles ahead of any other being, in brawns and brains. A man who is innately superior, who can subjugate anyone without so much as breaking a sweat. A man whose body is so superior to others that it demands to be worship by those inferior lest they want to face the consequences of resistance," he winked at you as he said this, "A man which nature designed to be capable of doing anything he desires. That's what a real man is, understand?"

"Sir, with all due respect, I don't believe what you're saying to be true," your visibly confused classmate retorted.

"Oh that's right, you're the only one here who hasn't seen what a real man is capable of. Probably because your test scores are better than these dumb asses," Mr. Smith gestures to the rest of your classmates," they've all had to come to my special after school tutoring sessions where they've gotten first hand experience of just what a real man's body can do. I'm sure they can fill you in later."

You were shocked to discover that so many of your classmates had suffered the same fate as you. Come to think of it, everyone except that one classmate got winks from Mr. Smith when he subjected them to his various odors.

"Anyways, about sustainability, if we'd follow what nature intended then we wouldn't have to worry about resources running out. It's because of weaklings like you bunch encroaching into real man's territory that the issue has arisen. What happened to the good old days when burly lumberjacks would chop down trees by hand or when muscular miners went into mines with nothing more than a pickaxe? Now it's a bunch of weaklings operating machinery that do the jobs that real men used to do, that's why there's a sustainability problem. Now, if you weaklings would stay in your lane and let the men handle the real work then the problem would be solved, bam just saved your hours of classroom time."

"What if resources start to become rapidly depleted nonetheless? Plus, you only answered one of the issues I brought up," asked your unrelenting classmate.

"If they start to become depleted anyways then that means that you weaklings are using up too many of our resources and that we need to start keeping the goods for ourselves, we're your superiors after all!" stated Mr. Smith whilst making use of the royal we, "as for your other points, they're pointless. What you call loss of diversity I call survival of the fittest and what you call climate change I call bullshit. You see, if a species is too weak to survive the actions of real men then it was too weak for this world, plane and simple," the class was visibly confused at this with that one kid ready to his rebuttal,"Let me give you a couple of examples you all can understand. If a bush dies because a real man pisses on it, then that species of bush didn't deserve life in the first place. If a species of bird goes extinct because a real man chopped down the trees it lived in, then that species deserved to die out for not finding a new home. If a species of game dies out because a real man hunted it to extinction, then it should have put up a better fight. If fish start to die out because a real men are taking shits in a stream that leads to the ocean, then the fish's existence was worth no more than that man's shit that caused its death. Don't you understand yet? It's the duty of us real men to weed out the weak through our daily actions so that, one day, only the worthy will populate the planet. Only those creatures that are strong enough to coexist in a world dominated by real men will live to see that glorious day. In that group there will naturally be some weaklings like all of you, the strongest of the weak, you'll make great playthings. This isn't to say that all of you will survive, far from it, I just mean that those that do survive will have a rather unfavorable existence."

You, along with all of your classmates, sat flabbergasted at what your math teacher had just said. Some thought it was some sort of joke, oh how wrong they were. The only person who stood ready to fight back was the person who started it all, "Not only is the blatantly false, you also failed to address my point of climate change."

"I hate to break it to you, kid, but I'm 100% right but, I'll still play along. Tell me, in scientific detail, what causes climate change."

"Well, it's caused by the greenhouse effect, when greenhouse gases are released into the atmosphere they trap in heat. This usually wouldn't be a problem except that us humans are releasing way more greenhouse gases then what can be absorbed by plants and such."

"I'll tell you what, kid, if we can prove that the greenhouse effect is real, right here right now, then I'll concede that climate change is real," said Mr. Smith in a fed up tone, clearly tired of this kid's arguments.

"I wouldn't know how to do that," said your classmate, "we'd need a greenhouse or something."

"Why don't you just make one?" asked Mr. Smith

"We'd need an enclosed space that has exposure to light and a steady flow of greenhouse gases so I don't see how I can just make one," responded your classmate in an equally fed up tone.

(out of space :()
15411111111111211.title: Your Last Day

154111111111112111.content:
A sinister grin crept across Mr. Smith's handsome face, "Why don't we use this classroom as a greenhouse? The windows let in plenty of light and we have a thermometer to measure the temperature."

"That still leaves the greenhouse gases," said your classmate. The rest of the class however, saw where this was going and were ready to abandon ship.

"Oh I think I've got that covered," smirked Mr. Smith, "Make a note of what the temperature is now and we'll compare it to what it is at the end of the period."

"Whatever," said your classmate, still ignorant to what Mr. Smith had planed. On the other hand, you and the rest of your classmates had started to head towards the door.

"Not so fast, we're gonna need all of you to stay. Extra accountability for the results of the experiment. Now, without further ado, let's get this thing started!"

"Hey, you wanted a greenhouse gas so I'm giving you some fresh methane, straight from my gut. I guess that makes it locally sourced and organic, those are somethings your generation enjoys. Be grateful that I'm giving you nothing but the best *gurgle* here comes more!"

"Ahh~, looks like you're getting to experience some of the powers of a real man after all, egghead," Mr. Smith jested at your one classmate as he desperately tried to filter out the smell with his shirt.

Your entire class was in agony as you all were forced to inhale the stench of Mr. Smith's digested breakfast along with a tinge of his morning protein shake. At least his pants kept you from taking in the full power of his blasts since they did a good job of preventing any droplets of ass sweat from joining the mixture.

As the period waned on the classroom became noticeably hotter until it got to the point where every blast seemed to raise the temperature by a couple degrees on its own. It was absolutely unbearable, the combination of the extreme heat, the smell, and the legitimately toxic fumes that robbed the air of breathable oxygen was too much for some of your classmates to handle, they began to pass out one by one, their bodies soaked in sweat. You began to think that you would soon join them when you were literally saved by the bell.

*pppffrrriiiinngggfftt*

The sound of the ringing bell was accompanied by a final, triumphant, dominance asserting blast from Mr. Smith which, in no doubt, probably raised the temperature of the room by a good amount.

"Oof, that was a beefy one. Well, let's hear it, what're the results, egghead?" cheerfully said Mr. Smith.

Your one classmate dragged them selves to the thermometer and groaned out the results, "starting temperature was 72°F (22.2°C) *gag* ending temperature was 122°F (50°C)."

"Huh, I guess climate change is real. Whatever, doesn't matter anyways," bluntly stated Mr. Smith

"Hwhat?!" exclaimed your one classmate between gasps and gags.

"You see, greenhouse gas emissions are mainly done by real men which means that it's nature's will since it made us so domineering. Allow me to educate you, it is my job after all! Greenhouse gas emissions mainly come from power production, cars, and agriculture if I'm not mistaking. Let's start with power production, to make power we burn coal, coal that real men mine and transport to the power plant. The power plant that was built by real men doing a real man's work, see where I'm going with this? Anyways, coal will probably remain king since it's one of the manliest form of power production unlike that wimpy solar and wind that your generation insists is the future. Literally everything about coal is manlier, from it being mined to it being burned. First off, to mine it, the proper way mind you, you need a gang of rugged men to mine it up using nothing more than their brute strength, being rewarded by emerging from the mine covered in the fruits of their labor, signalling to all just how manly they are. Not to mention the sweat that they would work up from spending all day in a hot mine, alerting all with noses within a couple mile radius of the presence of real men. From there, it's driven in large, imposing, manly trucks by burly truckers wearing nothing more than a stained, sweat soaked wife beater and a pair of jeans, leaning over every once in a while to blast a fart as loud and threatening as a blast from his truck's horn. Lastly, at the plant where it's burned and reduced to nothing more than ash, destruction that has fascinated man since the dawn of time, with threatening black smoke clouding the skies. Can't you just smell the testosterone?" inquired Mr. Smith as he took in a deep inhale before exhaling blissfully, "As for cars or, in a real man's world, trucks, would naturally provide us with a good means of transportation for us since you can't expect such divine beings to walk everywhere. They'll most likely be lifted diesel trucks since they're the manliest type of pickup truck that you can have since they're loud, imposing, and strong, just like their drivers. Plus, as an added bonus, their belches of black exhaust smoke can be used to intimidate any weaklings on the road as well as provide a method for seeing whose truck is the best. I imagine that truck pulls and mud races will be fairly common. Lastly, for agriculture, most greenhouse gases come from cattle which, as you might have guessed, aren't going anywhere. No meal is manlier than a nice cut of rare steak that a real man grilled up, giving our powerful guts a workout as they fight to churn the mostly raw beef into a shapeless sludge that our bodies can absorb and use to make more muscle thanks to all that protein. And, there's the added bonus of the process making plenty of mean gas, which brings me to a bonus point. Real men fart, a lot, loud and proud for all to hear and smell, just one of the signs of our superior beings. If I were to guess, I'd say the average real man farts anywhere from 100-500 times a day depending on what they've eaten. Now, these aren't just tiny mouse farts but full on cannon blasts, each packed full of methane. All of that methane from all of those farts is bound to make an impact on the climate, isn't it? This brings me to my conclusion, any effects brought on by climate change are brought on because us real men willed it which means that it's all part of nature's plan. Any species to die or suffer from it deserve to as they're too weak to withstand the power of a real man, as some of you are," Mr. Smith says as he glances at your unconscious classmates, "I hope all of you understand that this is inevitable, anyways, have a good summer. Class dismissed."

As soon as Mr. Smith said those last words it was as if someone opened a floodgate as all of your conscious classmates poured from the classroom doors. You knew that it was futile to fight your way out so you calmly gathered your belonging before heading to the doors, passing by Mr. Smith in the process.

"I hope that you've returned all of your textbooks, be a shame if you missed one and got hit with a fine. Anyways, I hope you have a great summer! It's been fun having you in class, I will certainly be remembering you," cheerfully chirped Mr. Smith.

"uhh, thanks. I'll remember you as well, I guess"

"I sure hope you do. Well, enjoy the rest of your miserable existence," Mr. Smith gleefully said as you exited his classroom for the last time.
